snippet: The push came after Anthem, one of the nation’s largest health insurers, said that the personal data of tens of millions of its customers had been compromised.
abstract: White House unveils several initiatives to bolster data-privacy laws, including bid to examine discriminatory pricing on the Internet; push will also include Republican-sponsored bill to protect data collected from students' educational apps.
lead_paragraph: The push came after Anthem, one of the nation’s largest health insurers, said that the personal data of tens of millions of its customers had been compromised.

headline.main: White House Accelerates Drive to Improve Data Privacy
headline.print_headline: A Push to Improve Data Privacy Laws

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: White House Council of Economic Advisers
